thread.title: Reese Witherspoon, Kerry Washington, & More Stars Come Together to Encourage Women to Embrace Ambition!
thread.title_full: Reese Witherspoon, Kerry Washington, & More Stars Come Together to Encourage Women to Embrace Ambition!

author: Just Jared
title: Reese Witherspoon, Kerry Washington, & More Stars Come Together to Encourage Women to Embrace Ambition!
text:
Reese Witherspoon , Kerry Washington , Jon Hamm , Chris Pine , and many more stars have teamed up with the Tory Burch Foundation for a new PSA encouraging women to embrace ambition.
The new campaign coincides with International Women’s Day and Women’s History Month.
Inspired by Tory ’s personal experience as a woman and an entrepreneur, the campaign aims to address the double standard that exists around ambition, which is often seen as a great attribute in men and as a negative in women.
Some of the other stars in the campaign include Gwyneth Paltrow , Julianne Moore , Zoey Deutch , Yara Shahidi , Rashida Jones , Billie Jean King , Gabby Douglas , Laila Ali , and more.
Zoey actually talked about being an ambitious woman in a recent interview!

#EmbraceAmbition PSA
